title: 旧约 - 约伯记(Job) - 第 38 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 约伯记(Job) -- 第 38 章 ( 本篇共有 42 章 )

lineList.en: Then the LORD answered Job out of the whirlwind, and said,
lineList.cn: 那时，耶和华从旋风中回答约伯说，

lineList.en: Who is this that darkeneth counsel by words without knowledge?
lineList.cn: 谁用无知的言语，使我的旨意暗昧不明。

lineList.en: Gird up now thy loins like a man; for I will demand of thee, and answer thou me.
lineList.cn: 你要如勇士束腰。我问你，你可以指示我。

lineList.en: Where wast thou when I laid the foundations of the earth? declare, if thou hast understanding.
lineList.cn: 我立大地根基的时候，你在那里呢。你若有聪明，只管说吧。

lineList.en: Who hath laid the measures thereof, if thou knowest? or who hath stretched the line upon it?
lineList.cn: 你若晓得就说，是谁定地的尺度。是谁把准绳拉在其上。

lineList.en: Whereupon are the foundations thereof fastened? or who laid the corner stone thereof;
lineList.cn: 地的根基安置在何处。地的角石是谁安放的。

lineList.en: When the morning stars sang together, and all the sons of God shouted for joy?
lineList.cn: 那时晨星一同歌唱，神的众子也都欢呼。

lineList.en: Or who shut up the sea with doors, when it brake forth, as if it had issued out of the womb?
lineList.cn: 海水冲出，如出胎胞，那时谁将它关闭呢。

lineList.en: When I made the cloud the garment thereof, and thick darkness a swaddlingband for it,
lineList.cn: 是我用云彩当海的衣服，用幽暗当包裹它的布，

lineList.en: And brake up for it my decreed place, and set bars and doors,
lineList.cn: 为它定界限，又安门和闩，

lineList.en: And said, Hitherto shalt thou come, but no further: and here shall thy proud waves be stayed?
lineList.cn: 说，你只可到这里，不可越过。你狂傲的浪要到此止住。

lineList.en: Hast thou commanded the morning since thy days; and caused the dayspring to know his place;
lineList.cn: 你自生以来，曾命定晨光，使清晨的日光知道本位。

lineList.en: That it might take hold of the ends of the earth, that the wicked might be shaken out of it?
lineList.cn: 叫这光普照地的四极，将恶人从其中驱逐出来吗。

lineList.en: It is turned as clay to the seal; and they stand as a garment.
lineList.cn: 因这光，地面改变如泥上印印，万物出现如衣服一样。

lineList.en: And from the wicked their light is withholden, and the high arm shall be broken.
lineList.cn: 亮光不照恶人，强横的膀臂也必折断。

lineList.en: Hast thou entered into the springs of the sea? or hast thou walked in the search of the depth?
lineList.cn: 你曾进到海源，或在深渊的隐密处行走吗。

lineList.en: Have the gates of death been opened unto thee? or hast thou seen the doors of the shadow of death?
lineList.cn: 死亡的门曾向你显露吗。死荫的门你曾见过吗。

lineList.en: Hast thou perceived the breadth of the earth? declare if thou knowest it all.
lineList.cn: 地的广大你能明透吗。你若全知道，只管说吧。

lineList.en: Where is the way where light dwelleth? and as for darkness, where is the place thereof,
lineList.cn: 光明的居所从何而至。黑暗的本位在于何处。

lineList.en: That thou shouldest take it to the bound thereof, and that thou shouldest know the paths to the house thereof?
lineList.cn: 你能带到本境，能看明其室之路吗。

lineList.en: Knowest thou it, because thou wast then born? or because the number of thy days is great?
lineList.cn: 你总知道，因为你早已生在世上，你日子的数目也多。

lineList.en: Hast thou entered into the treasures of the snow? or hast thou seen the treasures of the hail,
lineList.cn: 你曾进入雪库。或见过雹仓吗。

lineList.en: Which I have reserved against the time of trouble, against the day of battle and war?
lineList.cn: 这雪雹乃是我为降灾，并打仗和争战的日子所预备的。

lineList.en: By what way is the light parted, which scattereth the east wind upon the earth?
lineList.cn: 光亮从何路分开。东风从何路分散遍地。

lineList.en: Who hath divided a watercourse for the overflowing of waters, or a way for the lightning of thunder;
lineList.cn: 谁为雨水分道。谁为雷电开路。

lineList.en: To cause it to rain on the earth, where no man is; on the wilderness, wherein there is no man;
lineList.cn: 使雨降在无人之地，无人居住的旷野。

lineList.en: To satisfy the desolate and waste ground; and to cause the bud of the tender herb to spring forth?
lineList.cn: 使荒废凄凉之地得以丰足，青草得以发生。

lineList.en: Hath the rain a father? or who hath begotten the drops of dew?
lineList.cn: 雨有父吗。露水珠是谁生的呢。

lineList.en: Out of whose womb came the ice? and the hoary frost of heaven, who hath gendered it?
lineList.cn: 冰出于谁的胎。天上的霜是谁生的呢。

lineList.en: The waters are hid as with a stone, and the face of the deep is frozen.
lineList.cn: 诸水坚硬（或作隐藏）如石头，深渊之面凝结成冰。

lineList.en: Canst thou bind the sweet influences of Pleiades, or loose the bands of Orion?
lineList.cn: 你能系住昴星的结吗。能解开叁星的带吗。

lineList.en: Canst thou bring forth Mazzaroth in his season? or canst thou guide Arcturus with his sons?
lineList.cn: 你能按时领出十二宫吗。能引导北斗和随它的众星（星原文作子）吗。

lineList.en: Knowest thou the ordinances of heaven? canst thou set the dominion thereof in the earth?
lineList.cn: 你知道天的定例吗。能使地归在天的权下吗。

lineList.en: Canst thou lift up thy voice to the clouds, that abundance of waters may cover thee?
lineList.cn: 你能向云彩扬起声来，使倾盆的雨遮盖你吗。

lineList.en: Canst thou send lightnings, that they may go, and say unto thee, Here we are?
lineList.cn: 你能发出闪电，叫它行去，使它对你说，我们在这里。

lineList.en: Who hath put wisdom in the inward parts? or who hath given understanding to the heart?
lineList.cn: 谁将智慧放在怀中。谁将聪明赐于心内。

lineList.en: Who can number the clouds in wisdom? or who can stay the bottles of heaven,
lineList.cn: 谁能用智慧数算云彩呢。尘土聚集成团，土块紧紧结连。

lineList.en: When the dust groweth into hardness, and the clods cleave fast together?
lineList.cn: 那时，谁能倾倒天上的瓶呢。

lineList.en: Wilt thou hunt the prey for the lion? or fill the appetite of the young lions,
lineList.cn: 母狮子在洞中蹲伏，少壮狮子在隐密处埋伏。

lineList.en: When they couch in their dens, and abide in the covert to lie in wait?
lineList.cn: 你能为它们抓取食物，使它们饱足吗。

lineList.en: Who provideth for the raven his food? when his young ones cry unto God, they wander for lack of meat.
lineList.cn: 乌鸦之雏因无食物飞来飞去，哀告神。那时，谁为它预备食物呢。
